raw_comment:
Catchy title-"Is the world a good place for some people?"

What I notice-
I notice that the group of people who say the world is getting better are younger people, but they are in poorer countries. Maybe this is because they don't have as much greed and want as the wealthier people. 

What I wonder-
I wonder why the poorer countries think the world is becoming a better place, and the wealthier people think the world is a bad place. 

How does this relate to me- 
This graph doesn't relate to me because I am not in that age group.
ace_sentences: The title is: Is the world a good place for some people?
I notice a group of people.
The people in this group say that the world is getting better.
Many people in this group are younger people.
Many people in this group live in poorer countries.
I think that this may be because these people have less greed than wealthier people.
I think that this may be because these people want less than wealthier people.
I wonder why people in poorer countries think that the world is becoming a better place.
I wonder why wealthier people think that the world is a bad place.
This graph does not relate to me.
I am not in that age group.
